title: "New Digital Studio Lets Brands Build Their Own Realistic Human Avatars Powered by AI"
excerpt: "The San Francisco-based company debuted a digital brand studio this week that lets clients customize their own digital person by choosing from a set of realistic CGI avatars and uploading conversational trees with natural language processing systems from Google or IBM."
